repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: John W. Macy Letter to Richard Strassberg Regarding Employee-Management in Federal Civil Service
did.abstract: Letter from John W. Macy to Richard Strassberg regarding U.S. President's Committee to Review E.O. 10988 (Employee-Management Program in the Federal Civil Service), and related correspondence.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from John W. Macy to Richard Strassberg regarding U.S. President's Committee to Review E.O. 10988 (Employee-Management Program in the Federal Civil Service), and related correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: John W. Macy Letter to Richard Strassberg Regarding Employee-Management in Federal Civil Service #5726m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5583/3: Archives Organization File (AOF) Part 3 5616: Isaac Max Rubinow Papers 5726m: John W. Macy Letter to Richard Strassberg Regarding Employee-Management in Federal Civil Service 5976 mf: Brotherhood of Sleeping Car Porters Records on Microfilm 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6047: Archives Information File 6099: Ismar Baruch Compilation of U.S. Employment Service and U.S. Civil Service Documents
